job_title: Certified Medical Assistant in Decatur, GA

They will run you to death, and ask for more

job_title: Technical Services Help Desk in Lubbock, TX
pros: Excellent working enviornment, and great people to work with.  All changes being made are definitely bringing FirstCare into a up to par technologically.
cons: Lack of communication, and planning toward major changes.  Alot of the changes are also placing a greater work load on current employees and they are not being compensated.
